sentence.Network_en: The sulphuric acid ate into the parts of the metal where the coat of paint had peeled.

sentence.Network_en: Hydrogen is a product of the reaction between zinc and sulphuric acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 氢是锌和硫酸反应的生成物.
